title: Self‐supervised arbitrary‐scale super‐angular resolution diffusion MRI reconstruction
details: S Wang, L Wang, Y Cao, Z Deng, C Ye, R Wang, Y Zhu… - Medical Physics
abstract: Background Diffusion magnetic resonance imaging (dMRI) is currently the unique noninvasive imaging technique to investigate the microstructure of in vivo tissues. To fully explore the complex tissue microstructure at sub‐voxel scale, diffusion weighted …
